@NonNullApi @NonNullFields

程序包 org.springframework.data.redis

Root package for integrating Redis with Spring concepts.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ExceptionTranslationStrategy
    Potentially translates an Exception into appropriate DataAccessException.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    FallbackExceptionTranslationStrategy
    FallbackExceptionTranslationStrategy returns RedisSystemException for unknown Exceptions.
    PassThroughExceptionTranslationStrategy
    PassThroughExceptionTranslationStrategy returns null for unknown Exceptions.
    Version 已过时
    since 2.0, use Version.
    VersionParser 已过时
    since 2.0, use Version.
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    RedisConnectionFailureException
    Fatal exception thrown when the Redis connection fails completely.
    RedisSystemException
    Exception thrown when we can't classify a Redis exception into one of Spring generic data access exceptions.
    TooManyClusterRedirectionsException
    DataRetrievalFailureException thrown when following cluster redirects exceeds the max number of edges.

程序包org.springframework.data.redis的说明

Root package for integrating Redis with Spring concepts.

Provides Redis specific exception hierarchy on top of the org.springframework.dao package.
